page.title: 15Lord's Meadow Cont.
page.content: THE BROWNIE HUT The Brownies didn't have a meeting place until the hut was built. The hut is four years old and Mr. Woodford opened it. Mr. Woodford is the most important person who has visited the hut. At the hut there have only been little accidents; like when Lizby Jane got an earring stuck in her foot. The hut is also used for grown ups' meetings. BMX TRACK The BMX club was opened on 1st of Jan. 1985. The BMX club has 30 members. You have to be three or older to join the club. You have to bring your own bikes. There haven't been any serious accidents on the track.
